title: Outlook email issues - unable to follow support article
content:
I'm getting login issues to my Outlook account. I understand this is an emerging problem and I"m following the instructions here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202

However, I can't follow the instructions under section "Change Thunderbird authentication method for sending messages (SMTP)" because I don't have "Outgoing Server (SNMP)" in the lefthand side. I do have an option to edit Outgoing Server settings, but there is no option to set OAuth2 in the Authentication Method dropdown. I am unable to send Outlook emails, and I'm unable to complete the instructions to fix it. Help is appreciated!
creator: dertiger1

title: Is BCC working?
content:
I sent an email with multiple BCCs and no CCs or TOs, I put myself as one of the BCCs.

I did not receive it and I do not think anybody else did as well since I asked a few people.

The email is in the sent folder. I tried forwarding the email from my sent folder to myself as CC, and that worked. I also tried fowarding as BCC, and that worked.

So what is going on? Is BCC working? How can I know for certain? Do I need to foward the email as BCCs to all my BCCs to get this to work?

Thanks for your help.

R
creator: rcboire

title: Los mensajes que envío a una correo en concreto llegan a papelera
content:
Hola,

Desde hace un par de semanas los correo que mando a un compañero de trabajo aunque en un principio entrar a su bandeja de entrada pasados 3 segundos se mueven automáticamente a papelera. Solo me pasa con este compañero en concreto, con el resto el funcionamiento es normal.

Hemos estado mirando y no hay ninguna regla ni filtro configurado para que esto pase, todo parece estar normal. No sabemos que pasa ni cómo solucionarlo.

¿Alguien sabe que puede estar pasando?
creator: marketing100

title: How to delete a folder permanently without moving to trash first
content: I want to delete a mail folder from an IMAP server. When clicking "Delete" in right-click menu, Thunderbird tries to move it to trash. This fails for folders that are shared from another user with error "[CANNOT] Renaming not supported across non-private namespaces". When I switch the "When I delete a message" setting to "Remove it immediately" the folder is deleted correctly. Is it possible to do this just for folders? I tried Shift+Delete and holding Shift while clicking Delete but both did not work, Thunderbird tried and failed to move the folder to trash as usual. It would however be most useful if after failing to move the folder to trash it would give me an option to delete it permanently instead.
creator: pavelh

title: Impossibile inviare email da alcuni account fastweb
content:
Oggi improvvisamente THUNDERBIRD mi impedisce di inviare email ma solo da alcuni account FASTWEB! Come si fa di solito, FASTWEB permette di avere degli account secondari sotto il principale: da quest'ultimo non ci sono problemi e la posta esce regolarmente ma, se provo ad inviare un messaggio, sia nuovo che in risposta ad uno ricevuto, da uno dei tre account secondari, mi impedisce e viene fuori questo messaggio di errore:

Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: MAIL FROM:<fmasta88@fastwebnet.it> does not match authenticated user name. Verificare l’indirizzo email nelle impostazioni dell’account e riprovare.

Ho controllato le impostazioni, che io assolutamente non ho modificato, ma tutto è rimasto come prima. L'unico dubbio viene sul recente SW MALWAREBYTES installato per altri problemi: visto che fa una scansione automatica ad ogni avvio del PC, magari blocca qualcosa lui. TB è aggiornatissimo, come AV uso COMODO da anni, il SO è WIN10/64bit - Prima volta che mi capita una cosa del genere, non so più che fare!
creator: fmasta88

title: Cuando muevo correos a carpetas locales me siguen apareciendo en el servidor y me ocupan mucho espacio
content: Me he dado cuenta de que los correos me ocupan mucho espacio en el servidor aún moviéndolos a carpetas locales y lo que está ocurriendo es que aunque los mueva de la bandeja de entrada a una carpeta local, me sigue apareciendo el correo en el servidor. ¿Cómo es esto posible? ¿Hay alguna forma de solucionarlo? También he probado a mandar una copia a la carpeta local y a borrar el correo de la bandeja de entrada, y aún eliminado, me sigue apareciendo en el servidor. ¿Alguien puede ayudarme?
creator: info.connectingtranslations

title: Can't find unread Messages  - Fail to syncronize IMAPS
content:
Hello everybody,

I have includes 4 different email adresses in Thunderbird. All of them as IMAP. All the time everthing works fine, but for the last 2 weeks Thinderbird doesnt syncronize correctly.

For example: Thunderbird sees, that there are 8 unread messages in inbox, but at the same time Thunderbird does show me only 5 of them in the inbox. (When I login the the eMail-provider then there are all the 8 messages)

The "repair"-tool did not help so far. Diffrent mail-adresses show similar behavior.

I need a good idea.

Thanks a lot!

Simon
creator: s-amrein
